author: Home Repair Tutor
description:
This video shares PEX A plumbing installation tips, specifically how to install a Delta shower valve. Many thanks to SharkBite for sponsoring this tutorial. For the written tutorial and list of materials visit https://homerepairtutor.com/pex-plumbing/

#plumbing #sharkbite #homerepairtutor #brandpartner   

PEX Plumbing Installation Tips
0:13 PEX Thru-Stud Isolators
1:06 How to Add Shower Valve Wood Blocking
2:04 How to Use SharkBite PEX A
4:49 How to Prepare Delta Diverter Valve for PEX A
7:04 How to Install Drop Ear Elbow for PEX A
8:31 Shower Riser Pipe Installation 
10:56 Shower Backer Board Tips

These supplies were used in our video:

-SharkBite PEX A Tubing
-Milwaukee M18 PEX A Expansion Tool
-Oatey Megatape
-Blue Monster Pipe Thread Sealant
-SharkBite PEX Cutters
-SharkBite PEX A Sleeves
-Delta MultiChoice Shower Valve for PEX A (R100000)
-Delta Diverter Valve (R11000)
-SharkBite PEX A 90-Degree Fittings
-SharkBite PEX A Drop Ear Elbows
-SharkBite 1/2-inch adapters for PEX A
title: PEX A Plumbing Installation Tips
